channel.title: Mail on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Mail on Docs

item.title: American Movie Emperor Beagle "shot" plays dead and will add his own drama
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The Daily Mail published an anecdote on Feb. 13 about a dog owner in Las Vegas, Nevada, who aimed a gun at his Beagle and fired two shots. __ In the video, the hostess poses with her thumb, index finger and middle finger in the shape of a gun and dubs herself “Bang! Bang!” The dog is very cooperative and emotional, howling twice as the owner “shoots,” as if imitating the sad scene in a gunfight movie where the main character is shot and about to collapse, and then collapses on the mat next to her.
